title: The Week of Charlie Rogers: Tutor by Day, Hero by Night
summary: Charlie Rogers, a 45-year-old tutor, discovers his superpowers and saves his community from a mysterious threat over the course of a week.
summaryGerman: Charlie Rogers, ein 45-jähriger Tutor, entdeckt seine Superkräfte und rettet innerhalb einer Woche seine Gemeinde vor einer mysteriösen Bedrohung.
summaryDutch: Charlie Rogers, een 45-jarige tutor, ontdekt zijn superkrachten en redt zijn gemeenschap van een mysterieuze dreiging gedurende een week.
summaryFrench: Charlie Rogers, un tuteur de 45 ans, découvre ses superpouvoirs et sauve sa communauté d'une menace mystérieuse au cours d'une semaine.

story.text: Charlie Rogers starts his week in a typical manner, tutoring local students in mathematics. Unbeknownst to him, a strange meteorite nearby grants him the power of telekinesis.
Feeling unusually energetic, Charlie experiments with his newfound powers. He helps a student retrieve a lost kitten by moving a heavy branch using only his mind.
Charlie starts to feel the responsibility of his powers. He spends the day contemplating how to best use them while continuing his tutoring sessions.
A mysterious figure observes Charlie using his powers. Feeling intrigued and somewhat threatened, Charlie prepares for potential conflicts.
The observer reveals himself as a villain wanting to harness Charlie's powers for evil. A battle ensues, pushing Charlie to his limits to protect his students and their families.
After defeating the villain, Charlie is hailed as a local hero. He spends a calm day reflecting on the events, ensuring everyone he helped is safe and sound.
Charlie decides to use his powers to further assist in everyday community problems, bringing a sense of security and happiness to the neighborhood.

ending: By week's end, Charlie Rogers not only embraced his new identity as a superhero but also solidified his role as a beloved community tutor and protector.
moral: Great power comes with great responsibility, and the best use of power is in service to others.
